DOC.brief_summary: Three arm study compare three novel contact lens solution .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison 3 Novel Contact Lens Solutions Basal Lamina
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Stable distance contact lens prescription 0.50 D 9.00 D astigmatism less equal 1.00 D cylindrical ( cyl ) . Stable correction define long six month . Worn single brand disposable silicone hydrogel contact lenses successfully ( i.e. , without complication discomfort ) minimum six month Exclusion : Known sensitivity contact lens disinfect solution fluorescein dye . Any systemic ocular disease could affect contact lens wear . Women pregnant lactating .
